entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain near noon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
